item.title: Sunday afternoon talk with DK
item.description:
You are cordially invited to our Sunday afternoon talk on the 15th of December at 3 PM, inspired by “Erntedankfest”.

Starring: DIALOGIST-KANTOR / Toni Geirlandt and Carlos Montalvo Jeunesse et Arts Plastiques: Thibaut Blondiau Interviewed by Indra Devriendt (and you).
LLS Paleis Paleisstraat 140, 2018 Antwerp

+32 3 337 03 87 info@llspaleis.be llspaleis.be https://antwerpart.be/agenda/erntedankfest-joyeuses-moissons

Start: 3 PM Language: English Followed by Kaffee und Kuchen.

Everybody welcome!

As a part of the exhibition: Erntedankfest « Joyeuses moissons »
